root.name: Bonx
root.description: OverviewBonx was to be a four-player (against A.I. or friends via the link cable) "action-platform racer" in which players grew and divided their cube character to climb the blocky terrain and be the first to finish. Ten themed stages would present players with twenty different "courses" to race on; power-ups were included as well. Strategic sections of each course would magnify a power-up's strength. A Race Mode formed the basis of the game but a King of the Hill battle mode was also included where players would defend a peak position as long as possible.
